entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
